snippet: Charles Mysak's curbside business, an Upper West Side fixture, has been the subject of many complaints, and the police hauled away much of his untended inventory, again.
abstract: Charles Mysak's curbside business, an Upper West Side fixture, has been the subject of many complaints, and the police hauled away much of his untended inventory, again.

headline.main: Sidewalk Bookseller Returns to Find Shop Gone
